content.html: I’ve written about why we need to change the way we describe bad design patterns - and what to say instead. Thanks to @candiwrites and @CuriousScutter for making me aware of this issue in the first place. ⚠️ Content warning: racist language bit.ly/3nuC3lt
content.value:
I’ve written about why we need to change the way we describe bad design patterns - and what to say instead.

Thanks to @candiwrites and @CuriousScutter for making me aware of this issue in the first place.

⚠️ Content warning: racist language

bit.ly/3nuC3lt

content.html:
Just a blanket notice here, if you’re white and replying to this: a) don’t use the racist term b) feel free to keep your assessment of whether this is reasonable, proportionate or valid entirely to yourself c) you don’t have to have a take on everything, we’ll cope without it
twitter.com/amy_hupe/statu…
content.value:
Just a blanket notice here, if you’re white and replying to this:

a) don’t use the racist term

b) feel free to keep your assessment of whether this is reasonable, proportionate or valid entirely to yourself

c) you don’t have to have a take on everything, we’ll cope without it
